Trader Enverun:
Welcome, youngster. Our shop caters to both the magical and the mundane. The magician, the warrior, and those simply looking for something pretty to wear. We have such a good reputation for the carrying the rare and exotic, we even had an adventurer come by a few moons ago seeking spell books that might hold clues to the location of the lost Sword of Othelotte. An interesting chap, but did he actually BUY anything? No! Does this look like a blasted library to you?!
